Literature.Title: Structure and X-ray conformation of pseudodesmins A and B, two new cyclic lipodepsipeptides from Pseudomonas bacteria
Literature.Author: Sinnaeve D, Michaux C, Van Hemel J , Vandenkerckhove J, Peys E, Borremans  FAM, Sas B, Wouters J, Martins JC

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MIC=12.5µg/ml),Enterococcus faecium ATCC 700221(MIC=6.25µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=12.5µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 33591(MIC=12.5µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=>25µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 700408(MIC=>25µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=>25µg/ml),Clostridium perfringens ATCC 13124(MIC=6.25µg/ml),Candida albicans ATCC 24433(MIC=>25µg/ml),Cryptococcus neoformans ATCC 90112(MIC=>25µg/ml),Trichophyton mentagrophytes ATCC 9533(MIC=>25µg/ml)
